thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 11 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-GM Korea Outlines Viability Plan To Return To Profitability By 2019

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-GM Korea Outlines Viability Plan To Return To Profitability By 2019
text:
May 11 (Reuters) - General Motors:
* GM KOREA OUTLINES VIABILITY PLAN TO RETURN TO PROFITABILITY BY 2019
* GM AND KDB AGREED ON BALANCE SHEET RESTRUCTURING THAT WILL ALLOW GM KOREA TO REDUCE EXISTING DEBT BY ABOUT $2.8 BILLION
* GM KOREAâ€™S VIABILITY PLAN INCLUDES $2.8 BILLION INVESTMENT IN TWO NEW GLOBAL VEHICLE PROGRAMS
* UNDER VIABILITY PLAN, CO WILL DESIGN, ENGINEER & MANUFACTURE ALL-NEW SMALL SUV FOR KOREA AND EXPORT MARKETS
* UNDER PLAN, GM WILL MANUFACTURE ALL-NEW CUV-TYPE VEHICLE FOR KOREA AND EXPORT MARKETS
* UNDER VIABILITY PLAN, CO WILL ENGINEER, MANUFACTURE SMALL THREE-CYLINDER GASOLINE ENGINE IN KOREA FOR NEXT GENERATION GLOBAL VEHICLES Source text: ( bit.ly/2KfEpzg ) Further company coverage:
